title: Light-regulated root hair development? HY5 is a coordinator
content: Root hair enlarges root surface to facilitate processes such as nutrient uptake and plant-microbe interactions. Root hair development is regulated by various hormones. For example, auxin is known to promote root hair initiation and elongation (Vissenberg et al. 2020). However, the full picture of the signaling network involved in root hair development is far from complete.
